judgement: Tuka Ram And Anr vs State of Maharashtra
judges: Justice J. Singh, Justice Kailasam, Justice Koshal
description: The case is one of the alleged custodial rape of Mathura, a minor (adivasi) girl. The Supreme Courtheld that the defendants were not guilty due to the voluntary consent of the victim. As stated in the sessions court, it was held that Mathura willingly gave her consent to the sexual intercourse as she was habituated to it based on the two fingers.
